Latest quarter results included a $600,000, or 10 cents a share, gain from the sale of a Canadian plant, partially offset by a $300,000, or 4 cents a share, provision for the consolidation of electronic manufacturing facilities. Results for the 1988 fiscal year included a 37-cent-a-share accounting change gain.
